/-- The quotient of a second countable space by a group action is second countable. -/
@[to_additive "The quotient of a second countable space by an additive group action is second\ncountable."]

  topological_space.quotient.second_countable_topology is_open_map_quotient_mk_mul

/-- The quotient map by a group action is open, i.e. the quotient by a group action is an open
  quotient. -/
@[to_additive "The quotient map by a group action is open, i.e. the quotient by a group\naction is an open quotient. "]
theorem is_open_map_quotient_mk_mul [has_continuous_const_smul Î“ T] :
    is_open_map (Quotient.mk'' : T â†’ quotient (mul_action.orbit_rel Î“ T)) :=
  by
  intro U hU
  rw [is_open_coinduced, mul_action.quotient_preimage_image_eq_union_mul U]
  exact is_open_Union fun Î³ => (homeomorph.smul Î³).is_open_map U hU
#align is_open_map_quotient_mk_mul is_open_map_quotient_mk_mul
